Package net.alexanderdev.lightdrive.graphics.filter

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    Filter
    A FunctionalInterface which is used to filter a Sprite, and defines the rule(s) for determining the values for each pixel.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AdjustFilter
    A Filter which adjusts the percentage of all three RGB channels in the Sprite.
    AlphaFilter
    A Filter which adjusts the percentage of the alpha channel in the Sprite.
    BlurFilter
    A Filter which applies a simple 3x3 box blur to the Sprite.
    BrightnessFilter
    A Filter which applies a brightness effect to the Sprite.
    ColorMapFilter
    A Filter which replaces sequential shades of gray on the Sprite with the specified colors.
    ContrastFilter
    A Filter which changes the contrast of the Sprite.
    CyanotypeFilter
    A Filter which applies a cyanotype effect to the Sprite.
    GrayscaleFilter
    A Filter which applies a gray-scale effect to the Sprite.
    HueFilter
    A Filter which changes the hue of the Sprite.
    InvertFilter
    A Filter which inverts all three RGB channels in the Sprite.
    PosterizeFilter
    A Filter which applies a posterized effect to the Sprite.
    ReplaceFilter
    A Filter which replaces one set of colors in a Sprite with another set of colors.
    SaturationFilter
    A Filter which applies an desaturation or oversaturation effect to the Sprite.
    SepiaFilter
    A Filter which applies a sepia-tone effect to the Sprite.
